title: Obstacle
description: A generalized representation of an obstacle: Barrel, flag or line.

obstacleType.description: What type this obstacle is, i.e. whether it is a cylinder, line, flag, or something else.

uid.description: A unique identifier, assigned by the Map.

size.description: A polymorphic size specifier, in meters. Radius for cylindrical obstacles, width for lines.

confidence.description: The confidence in this object actually existing at the given location.

color.description: The color of an obstacle, if it is significant (e.g. for flags)
